thread.title: Gautham Menon to be a part of D16 director Karthick Naren Naragasooran - Tamil Movie News
thread.title_full: Gautham Menon to be a part of D16 director Karthick Naren Naragasooran - Tamil Movie News

title: Gautham Menon to be a part of D16 director Karthick Naren Naragasooran - Tamil Movie News
text: Arvind Swamy to team up with the most happening young director As we all know Tamil cinema's youngest director Karthick Naren who made a earth shattering debut with 'Dhruvangal Pathinaaru' released last year will soon start directing his second film titled as 'Naragasooran'. Arvind Swamy, Naga Chaitanya and a popular Malayalam actor are most likely to play the lead characters in the film though the official announcement on cast and crew members is yet to be made. At this juncture we get a stunner of an announcement from non other than today's Birthday boy, director-producer Gautham Vasudev Menon. Gautham has confirmed that he will be a part of 'Naragasooran'. Though the stylish filmmaker has not disclosed what is role will be,sources reveal that he will be the producer or one of the producers of 'Naragasooran'.
